title: ConvOptions stride, padding etc.
body_html:
🚀 Feature

Would be cool if you could pass the stride, padding, and so on to the torch::nn::ConvOptions constructor, see: https://pytorch.org/cppdocs/api/structtorch_1_1nn_1_1_conv_options.html#exhale-struct-structtorch-1-1nn-1-1-conv-options

Is it planned for future releases of the cpp api? How could I contribute to this?
body_text:

body:
## 🚀 Feature
Would be cool if you could pass the stride, padding, and so on to the `torch::nn::ConvOptions` constructor, see: https://pytorch.org/cppdocs/api/structtorch_1_1nn_1_1_conv_options.html#exhale-struct-structtorch-1-1nn-1-1-conv-options

Is it planned for future releases of the cpp api? How could I contribute to this?
